prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Synth Lead, Guitar, Drums, Piano, but without Organ.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Bass, Synth Lead, Guitar, Drums, and Piano, but no Organ.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Bass, Synth Lead, Guitar, Drums, and Piano, but excludes Organ.

Style 3:
This song is made up of Bass, Synth Lead, Guitar, Drums, Piano, but not Organ.
